testcaseName: Dose #1 is AstraZeneca Dose #2 is Sinovac Covid-19 and Vaccine #3 is Pfizer

administeredDoses.vaccineName: AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine (Non-US tradenames include VAXZEVRIA, COVISHIELD)
Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

doses.vaccineName: AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine (Non-US tradenames include VAXZEVRIA, COVISHIELD)
Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered a first dose of the Covid-19 vaccine as AstraZeneca, a second dose of the Covid-19 vaccine as Sinovac, and a third (first booster) dose as Pfizer, that the doses are valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: v4.27  Updated test case to a fixed date test case to retain previous booster recommendations before the updated Covid-19 Interim Clinical Guidance (09/02/2022).
